channel.title: What does this error mean?
channel.description:
When I go to compile on a 562 I get this error:
[code]javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: What does this error mean?
item.dc:creator: @pobdol pobdol
item.description:
@pobdol wrote:

[quote=“ta1nt3d, post:10, topic:380180”]lol looks like you need to change your version of java in the run.bat

you can look in your c:/ to see what version of java you have but by the looks of it you have version 23 which is the latest so if this is true change the 22 in your run.bat to 23[/quote]

Thanks everythings going good. I just have problems starting client i get this error.

error_game_js5connect

Read full topic

item.title: What does this error mean?
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

lol looks like you need to change your version of java in the run.bat

you can look in your c:/ to see what version of java you have but by the looks of it you have version 23 which is the latest so if this is true change the 22 in your run.bat to 23

The error only comes whit the client? or also whit the server?
And its the wrong section, but w/e[/quote]

And sorry bout wrong section was just looking for help :s

item.title: What does this error mean?
item.dc:creator: @pobdol pobdol
item.description:
@pobdol wrote:

[quote=“Christiaan, post:2, topic:380180”]Wrong directory to your java files, can we see your run.bat? (right-click, edit)
You have to add “cd map to go in” in the run.bat to reach your java files.[/quote]

-Source Info Below-

[table]
[tr]
[td]Source Compiler:
[/td][/tr][/table] @echo off TITLE Compiler cd src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Source Runserver.bat:

@echo off title rs2hd framework "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar com.rs2hd.Main pause

-Client Info Below-

[table]
[tr]
[td]Client Compiler/Build:
[/td][/tr][/table]@echo off cd . "C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp lib/clientlibs.jar; -deprecation -d bin -sourcepath src src/*.java pause

Client run.bat:

@echo off java -cp bin;lib/clientlibs.jar client 0 live english game0 pause

MY CLASSPATH:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

MY PATH:

C:\Windows\System32\;C:\Windows\;C:\Windows\System32\Wbem;D:\Program Files\ImageConverter Plus;D:\Program Files\ImageConverter Plus\Microsoft.VC90.CRT;D:\Program Files\ImageConverter Plus\Microsoft.VC90.MFC;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac;

Read full topic

item.title: What does this error mean?
item.dc:creator: @Christiaan Christiaan
item.description:
@Christiaan wrote:

Wrong directory to your java files, can we see your run.bat? (right-click, edit)
You have to add “cd map to go in” in the run.bat to reach your java files.

Read full topic
